neg review: it was extremly cold in the room when I arrived there. I tried to put the ventilation on 30 degrees, but did not help much. Impossible to connect to wifi. The login and password that I got at reception were not compatible with the NH Hotels screen that I was supposed to fill in.
Bar prices and breakfast cost was very expensive for whsy was on offer

pos review: Very comfortable, at a reasonable distance from the attractions

neg review: The room is truly out dated, amenities are not working properly. Even the coffee machine is rusted from inside badly.  Hotel needs major updating

pos review: There is in 8 floor hidden gem in shape of a fitness with stunning view on the botanic, if you wake up early you cen see beautiful sunrise if the weather is good
neg review: The coffe machine did not worked, one bed light was broken and the whole system of lightning of the room was very bad, and no handmade painting can fix that.

pos review: Very cold room in almost winter
neg review: Room very cold and staff too
The room old so much,I think their is ghost in room 637
